name: A Vr ZombieShooter (In a heart beat game jam)
name_original: A Vr ZombieShooter (In a heart beat game jam)
description:
A zombie shooter made for the UT Gamers guild Winter Game jam (2023)

Features
Wave based shooter, Endless game-loop, 
Heartbeat slow-motion, minecraft sounds, custom built using mega scan assets abandoned factory

Asset used
BNG framework, Quixel mega scan assets, Mixamo models, generic free sounds , Emerald AI, free generic blood

Controls

Grip - hold, Trigger - shoot, A- slowmotion , left stick - move
